title: Mobile World: the Huawei phone that can drive a car
text:
Mobile World: the Huawei phone that can drive a car 5:23pm GMT - 01:39 
Chinese smartphone manufacturer Huawei has shown how an AI-powered smartphone can drive a car.As Ivor Bennett reports, the 'RoadReader' project, on display at the Mobile World Congress in Barcelona, aims to demonstrate how existing mobile technology is capable of handling autonomous vehicles.
